title: Relationships
brief_description: Starting, ending and maintaining relationships is never easy. Peter Quarry leads couples through the minefield and discusses: What attracts people to each other, how to turn a friendship into something deeper, how to keep a relationship alive, conflict, resolution, knowing when to quit, being single and enjoying it.
